indicators.name: Invasive Recovery
indicators.definition: The percentage of regrowth of Cestrum aurantiacum individuals over time, indicating the effectiveness of removal efforts.

evidence.snippet: Invasive Recovery % regrowth of C. auranticum individuals

indicators.name: Biodiversity Gains
indicators.definition: The change in species richness over time, indicating an increase in biodiversity.

evidence.snippet: Biodiversity Gains Increase in species richness

indicators.name: Plot Invasion Level
indicators.definition: The initial baseline categorization of a plot based on the density of mature C. aurantiacum.
